rows.label: qst106003_msg0001
rows.name:
First friends need to gather
Golden Cog.

rows.label: qst106003_msg0002
rows.name:
This only very first step.
Best to get it over with quick-quick!

rows.label: qst106003_msg0101
rows.name:
Busy preparing for remodeling
right now.

rows.label: qst106003_msg0102
rows.name:
Friends forget about me for now
and focus on outfit, yes?

rows.label: qst106003_msg0301
rows.name:
Now, friends go to Goldmund Flight
Deck in Avaritia and speak to Nopon
by name of Fleecyflossy!

rows.label: qst106003_msg0302
rows.name:
Help Hana do trial attendance
at Bluesky Nopon University
and learn many things.

rows.label: qst106003_msg0303
rows.name:
Only when education complete is
Hana ready for big remodeling!

rows.label: qst106003_msg0304
rows.name:
Entering university is most important
thing of all!

rows.label: qst106003_msg0401
rows.name: All ready for remodeling of Hana.

rows.label: qst106003_msg0402
rows.name:
Now all that left is to charge up energy
in charging unit right there.

rows.label: qst106003_msg0403
rows.name:
Maybe most efficient way is use
mercenaries to gather E-Pack.
